immediate_actions: Cool gently with room-temp water 5-10 mins

seek_medical_attention.timeframe: If blistering, large area, or near eyes/ears

full_protocol_text: Cat minor burn (stove, hot surface): Cool gently with room-temp water 5-10 mins. Pat dry. Monitor for blisters. See vet if blisters, large area, or cat seems in pain.
